bill.title: Midnight Rules Relief Act of 2019
bill.description: Allows Congress to disapprove multiple regulations under one joint resolution of disapproval if the regulations were submitted for review during the last 60 legislative days of the final year of a President's term. Currently, each joint resolution may disapprove of only one regulation.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Antitrust, Commercial, and Administrative Law

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Antitrust, Commercial, and Administrative Law

history.action: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
